name: Incinerate
description: You summon forth a burning hot flame that surrounds a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d10 + MOVE fire damage on a hit. On a hit, if the target is holding a berry, it is immediately burned to ash, becoming unusable.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Makes audience expect little of other contestants.
